website_summaries.verdict: Nice all-around cleaner that delivers a good price per ounce. Free of harsh chemicals and VOCs.
pros: Safe to use around pets and children
Does a nice job with stains and soils versus other all natural cleaners
Works nicely on almost any hard surface in the home
cons: Will leave a residue on certain surfaces without rinsing

customer_reviews.title: I use everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite thing. I saw on shark tank and had to get a whole bunch of their products. After I saw them rub raw chicken on a counter and clean with one product and still have bacteria, then cleaned with this and there was almost nothing... I had to have it!!! I use it to clean countertops and for anything, really. It's great for wherever you need to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Cents For My Scents

customer_reviews.title: Incredible product! Will be a lifetime user.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING! I saw it on SharkTank and decided to give it a shot. Cleans spectacularly and I've used it on everything in my house, from baseboards to counters with food on them. Will happily buy again and again! Note: it does get a little "foamy" when you're wiping it up, but it dissipates as it dries and doesn't leave streaks or residue.
customer_reviews.author: The Davis Family

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff! It makes cleaning effortless
customer_reviews.text: I have emphysema. I have breathing problems when I use "regular" name brand cleaners. I used this stuff today on my kitchen stovetop. I'm lazy, and the junk was crusted on there. I sprayed the stovetop and let it soak in for awhile. I rubbed lightly with a non-abrasive cleaning pad. The caked on junk came off like magic. I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald W. Knights

customer_reviews.title: Unscented, really??
customer_reviews.text: Before I even opened the box, I could smell an odor coming from it. I am somewhat sensitive to smells, but usually do tolerate pretty much most smells I encounter. I now have my windows open and have developed a headache. The bottles are now sitting outside and won't be used. Unscented is definitely not an accurate description. I usually don't complain about such things, but if you have any sensitivity to chemicals (or even if you don't), I wanted to warn you not to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Stearns, author of 'Multiply and Divide with Sticks and Steps'

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money !
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner does not work on cabinets, walls, refrigerators, etc. Will go in the garbage. Can't believe so many people gave it 5 stars. I would have given zero if that was possible. Terrible waste of money !!
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Sudsy, Need to rinse too
customer_reviews.text: I don’t use much after I used it to clean apartment before moving. It’s one you’d have to rinse off because the suds are horrible to try to wipe off otherwise. When cleaning walls, it leaves a shiny residue once dry. I only use for windows and shower now, those aren’t too bad to use it up. I like that it’s unscented for the shower, but I still rinse. Hard areas I’d still use Scrubbing Bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: WA_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tried the rest? Now try the best!
customer_reviews.text: Have been in search of a ready-to-use, natural cleaner for years. We’ve tried countless products, including the popular Mrs. Meyers (scents are way too strong!), and Method (just meh), and before that, even tried making our own vinegar- and baking soda-based products. But this stuff - WOW, this really cuts through grime, and even grease on my stovetop, without having to spray and wipe a second or third time. Bonus: comes in unscented - I add just a touch of lavender essential oil for a subtle scent, which for this scent-sensitive family is a godsend! LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.author: GaleO

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Love this product. Due to health issues, I have been looking for a cleaner that truly is unscented, actually cleans, and has no chemical/bleach/vinegar smell. This is IT! No scent. Cleans like a charm (even built up scum around the sink drain edge and around faucet bases) Got almost all of the marks out of my porcelain kitchen sink (the danged scratch marks that always show up!) Couldn't quite get the worst of them, but we can do the occasional Comet or Ajex for the worst of those. But for day to day cleaning that is safe for my health...I will be using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If I could give this 10 stars I would
customer_reviews.text: I used to use KABOOM to clean the clear glass doors for my shower but I had to plan to be out of the house after I finished because of the chemical fumes. Not only does this product have zero smell but it does a much better job than KABOOM and any other chemical cleaner I've ever used. Spray it on, let it soak for a few minutes. Spray again and wipe/clean with paper towels. 5 minutes later I was done and this stuff cut through all the soap residue left on the shower walls.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: It's the Better Life!
customer_reviews.text: We love Better Life! We found them from the website Gimme The Good Stuff where she wrote "Better Life offers an effective line of plant-derived, non-toxic cleaners free of artificial dyes, alcohol, synthetic fragrances, sulfates, petrochemicals, phthalates, and other Bad or Sneaky Stuff." We have since bought their dish soap, granite cleaner, wood polish and all purpose cleaner and I'm at ease cleaning with my 3 year old and 3 month old around.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Contains methylisothiazolinone, a potentially harmful preservative
customer_reviews.text: Despite the advertising and the touting of natural ingredients, safety for pets and kids, the product lists methylisothiazolinone as the preservative. This ingredient has been banned from certain uses in some European countries. It's highly linked to dermatitis in some individuals. Never mind the neurotoxicity in vitro found in a particular study. A better preservative would likely help boosts sales if this was a new selling point.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if this is the same product from shark tank where they spray it into their mouth but I couldn’t find the whatever spray so I’m guessing they revamped it to this one? We used to use Lysol in the house but after bringing our baby home, we wanted to go for a more natural and scent free alternative and we came across this product. After watching the shark tank episode where the guy literally sprayed it into his mouth, I was sold! Very pricey though. It’s 3x more expensive than Lysol but safe for my baby and family so it’s okay
customer_reviews.author: Dkay

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning Without Added Fragrance or Chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this product while researching how to clean silver plate! The author and silver smith recommended this product first before using silver polish as the least abrasive form of cleaning. I use it in my entire home now. I have kitties and I needed an unscented product as cats are very sensitive to Essential Oils and fragrances and my kitty with respiratory issues was having regular ashma attacts. This cleaner is making it easier to keep it clean without issues of toxic fragrances
customer_reviews.author: TxLavender&OldLace

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: This is false advertising. It does not remove water stains, does not clean my shower or toilet, does not remove spots on clothes before washing. If I could return it I would.
customer_reviews.author: Elhomic

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY.  IT DOES NOT CLEAN BETTER THAN TAP WATER.
customer_reviews.text: First thing I noticed is that the pump is cheap and will no doubt break quickly. Then I started using it on my quartz outer tops ion my kitchen. Boy was I surprised....it doesn’t clean. Tap water works better. I wish I had read the reviews instead of just looking at the summary star rating. I have no idea how this product has so many stars. Maybe there are two different factories producing this stuff and I got it from the bad production. DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Caputo

customer_reviews.title: Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist recommended this to use as I get atopic dermatitis and am trying to keep any triggers at bay. I received my 2 bottles today and used it to clean the inside of my car. Oh my! Wow! It really worked so well - especially cleaning out the NH winter grime and salt from my rubber floor mats. I used it for the entire inside of the car and it is now spit spot clean. I also cleaned my bathroom sinks and it left them and the chrome, shiny clean. Almost makes me want to go and clean some more.
customer_reviews.author: Nhwhazup

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Only One Sprayer :(
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to work really well, even on stainless steel, which I was surprised. I was disappointed that although the picture shows the order of 2 spray bottles comes with 2 complete bottles and sprayers, my order had 2 bottles and 1 sprayer. I had wanted to bring one to my office and leave one at home and now I have to use another bottle I have from something else- it should have 2 sprayers or change the picture and specify in description.
customer_reviews.author: DebbyL.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered this product because I couldn’t find any other types of disinfectant and I was almost completely out. It has a good scent (doesn’t really have one) and does do a good job of cleaning. I also like that it is safe to use around my children. I took away one star because I feel like I have to scrub more with this product than with traditional cleaning products.
customer_reviews.author: jh

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaner ever
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a little more than a month. No residue, leaves surfaces gleaming and feeling clean. It's awesome that this is non toxic and safe for little ones. Are my kids old enough to know not to lick countertops and floors? Yes. Does it happen from time to time? Probably. I have the unscented one. I never thought too much about scents or fumes before. I never noticed how much they bothered me until I started using this product. My only wish...I wish they would provide some data proving the efficacy of this cleaner. But I trust it nevertheless and plan to remain a loyal customer.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Effective on Stainless Steel
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. No smell at all. The hardest things to clean in the kitchen are our stainless steel appliances. Well, I'm pretty delighted with how well this product, sprayed on a microfiber cloth, does with the brushed stainless acreage. I've tried many stainless steel cleaners and they were either just a little too work intensive, came in a pressurized container, left an oily residue, or smelled, or any combination of the previous. This Better Life product really works.
customer_reviews.author: R. Eskite

customer_reviews.title: Contains Methylisothiazolinone for those who are allergic-like me
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product is plant based for less toxic cleaning BUT it contains the biocide Methylisothiazolinone which I am highly allergic to and try my absolute best to avoid and why I try to purchase these types of products. The ingredients list posted on this page only states preservative and doesn’t specify. Had I known it was this, I certainly wouldn’t have ordered. The industry needs to come up with something better for a preservative. I am not the only person allergic and that biocide is being used in too many cleaning and personal care products. Just a heads up if you are allergic.
customer_reviews.author: NVviaNJ

customer_reviews.title: Cleans stuck on lasagna and has no smell!
customer_reviews.text: I used Mrs Meyers lavender and that sweet smell was so strong I could barf. If someone is using a spray like that near me I have to leave the room. I love that there is no sulfates, no fragrance, no dyes, no petroleum based solvents. And most of all it works. I have used other green/earth friendly products that were so weak. I had lasagna splatter that had been stuck on my stovetop for 2 days (gross, I know). And this spray cleaned it right up. I use it in my bathroom, to dust furniture. The kitchen counter. The window sill. I use it everywhere and I don’t have to run away from the smell. I really recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: lo

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have bottles of this in my bathrooms to do quick clean ups and though I use toilet bowl cleaner for the bowl, I use this for everything else and the bathroom sparkles. Yesterday I realized my microwave really needed attention and I grabbed this and was amazed at how it cut through the grease and baked on food. I really like that I was using a cleaner that would not affect my food with toxic ingredients or smells. Now my microwave is sparkling inside and out.
customer_reviews.author: Campgirl

customer_reviews.title: Pet friendly. Good for cats sensitive to other green cleaners that include essential oils.
customer_reviews.text: Love this cleaner! I was using other green cleaners (with essential oils not great for cats) before this and my pets would have start having allergic reactions and sneezing. This eliminated that. Cleans stuck-on grime and oil surprisingly great. This is my favorite all purpose cleaning spray.
customer_reviews.author: S. Diese

customer_reviews.title: Not best and not the worst
customer_reviews.text: It was okay. It creates bubbles as you're wiping and leaves a residue behind. Not antibacterial, but an all around okay product. There are better choices. The nozzle for the spraying mechanism arrived cracked (very thin plastic) but does not interfere with functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Odorless but soapy-like
customer_reviews.text: I like what the product stands for, that it ha as strong spray throttle and that it’s odorless but I dislike that it has a soapy residue when wiping. Just using one to two sprays. I have to continuously wipe til it dissolves. Similar to putting moisturizer on your face and you have to keep rubbing it in til it dissolves!! Ugh.. But other than that. It’s cool. Based off it being natural products. I like. And is why I have a high rating. Based of the liquid substance... I’d rate this a 3.
customer_reviews.author: La Bella

customer_reviews.title: Great product crappy spray bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cleaner to temporarily replace the Clorox wipes that are currently very scarce. This stuff works great. I like the shine it leaves behind. The one thing I dislike a lot is the spray bottle. To use it you have to pump, pump, pump 10-12 times to cover a surface. Only a tiny bit comes out each time. It’s annoying. My mom, for instance, can’t even use it with slightly arthritic hands. I had to put it in a pump sprayer that works properly. Wish it was sold by the gallon so I could just refill my sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Lorre Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for two bottles of this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for two bottles of this stuff. I have even tested this on tempered glass and it cleans it pretty well with no streaking. The only downside to this product is that it does have an odor. You will smell it more when you use it in a bathtub, sink, or toilet. Everywhere else you won’t smell it. I recommend getting some sort of essential oil like lemon or lavander. It takes the odor away quite easily with a few drops.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Weber

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best! No more name brand for me!
customer_reviews.text: This product is worthy of high praise in my view. I am 61 years old and have every name brand cleaning product oN the market. No smell at all! You can saturate an item in this and you don’t have to leave say the bathroom because of toxic fumes. Spray, wipe, rinse. ZERO scrubbing! I like a fantastically clean home. I hate scrubbing to get it. I’ ll be looking for other products this company makes. Highly, highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: sheila 1977

customer_reviews.title: Leaves streaks on mirrors/glass
customer_reviews.text: I wish it worked- leaves streaks on mirrors and windows. I bought it for that purpose only as I wanted something cruelty-free and a glass cleaner, which was what it was rated highly on another website.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Very soapy and difficult to wipe up.
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner comes out soapy and bubbly. You will see when you spray it. It comes out like soap bubbles. It is difficult to clean up. I have to make a few passes with a sponge to wipe it all up. And I have to rinse out the sponge really well because that gets full of soap suds too. If you don't wipe it up completely, it will leave a soapy, film like residue. It smears quite a bit! It is just too much work to wipe up. I will go back to using vinegar + water. That is cheaper, natural, and can be wiped up in just a couple passes with the sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Abe2239

customer_reviews.title: Finally a good unscented all purpose cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has bad allergies. Because of this, we don't use any scented products. Finding a good, unscented all purpose cleaner is hard. About a year ago, I bought this one ( a two pack) and it is great. I just bought a second two pack. This is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Waited a while to write a review to see how well this stuff works. With young kids and pets really needed a cleaner that worked well and also safe. This product is great, especially for all those weird greasy stains that get everywhere from having small children. This is my new go to cleaner for everything.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the lack of smell
customer_reviews.text: One of the things I hate about using regular cleaners (like clorox wipes) is the strong odor left behind on the surfaces and on my hands. It deters me from using them unless I want to scrub my hands multiple times with soap. Well my pregnant self was super sensitive to smells and this cleaner was perfect. Didn't leave a scent on my hands and it feels good knowing I'm using a product that's safe for me and my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I do like it for cleaning my kitchen counters though
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to get cooking grease off my kitchen cabinets. The reviews sounded promising. The spray didn't have a harsh chemical smell - but it did not effectively remove the cooking grease from the cabinets. I do like it for cleaning my kitchen counters though. It does a good job and I am not worried about harsh residue being left behind
customer_reviews.author: Hurtt Mom

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Don’t bother buying this. Does not work well. Doesn’t clean well and don’t know about disinfecting capabilities
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great cleaner for her toys and high chair
customer_reviews.text: Does the job very well! And I can have peace of mind cleaning surfaces my baby comes in contact with because it is non-toxic and natural. It's a great cleaner for her toys and high chair, etc, since she puts everything in her mouth and this can clean the surfaces better than many competitors but without leaving behind toxic chemicals that could harm her.
customer_reviews.author: Frampton4

customer_reviews.title: 1000/10 cleaner!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THESE! They are really all-purpose; I use them to clean stains on wood to steel, and everything in between. They also aren’t toxic, which is a plus! It’s my go to cleaner, wonderful stuff. Never harmed any surface, can clean off oil, fingerprints, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not all it’s hyped up to be
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work - worst product I’ve ever bought for cleaning. Suds up - stove streaked and worst of all it’s not transparent that you can’t return this product and now I’m stuck with it and paid $15.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Scentless, Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: The spray is essentially scentless, which I like! I can use it to clean the whole kitchen without being overwhelmed with a scent. Cleans all types of surfaces well.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing and a bottle goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: This is the only spray I use around my house. It works well and it smells amazing. I have cats so it’s extra important to me to have a natural spray. Each bottle surprisingly lasts me a long time. I also love the spray handle of these bottles, they never leak or get messed up.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Harris

customer_reviews.title: New standards
customer_reviews.text: Seems a little more expensive than other cleaners but once you use it you'll see why, there's a new standard set in my house and I can thanjk better life for it. 100% will buy again 100% have bought again 100% will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Theodore L Morey III

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product, it's the best cleaning product I have ever purchased. I suffer from many allergies, other cleaning products make me cough and choke. Other cleaning products I felt the need to use a large amount to get the other products to work. You only need to use a little it goes a long way. I have used this on may surfaces. Everything looks very clean. My granite counters shine like glass. This product replaced my granite counter cleaner, windex, 409 and bathroom cleaner
customer_reviews.author: Berton Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Soapy
customer_reviews.text: Just used this for the first time. Cleaned granite counters and glass top table. Product is soapy and dries pretty quick. Not good on glass and it leave streaks on the granite counters. Not easy to use as you have to wipe and wipe and wipe again to remove the product. I see now that they make a cleaner for glass. I guess what I bought is not a multi surface cleaner that I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i was skeptical.. but this stuff is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that the product wouldn't work. But it works great! they give you a lot of product for your money. I will purchase it again and recommend it to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse DNice

customer_reviews.title: Works well and safe for our home
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this cleaner and I feel safe letting my children do thier chore of cleaning the counters with this spray. I also like that it does not have a scent, not perfumey or chemical, as scents are a real problem for our family. We will continue to use this in our home for our cleaning needs.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Um wow! This stuff works better than bleach! I finally decided to switch to a natural cleaner because by dogs have been having a reaction to something so I thought it couldn’t hurt to use something without harmful chemicals - so glad I did - not only is it better for us all, it works great! Usually I find myself scrubbing to get things clean, but a quick spray and wipe with this stuff left my mouth agape. I decided to be brave and even use it on my mirrors...and those too were spotless and streak free! Whaaa!? I’m done trying other cleaners - this is the stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Patrice E. Hubbell

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is incredible
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to have a pet-safe cleaning solution for my dog. I love that it is a great all-purpose cleaner with no scent and no bad chemicals. It works great on flat surfaces (kitchen, bathroom) but also on fabrics! My dog was still bleeding a little bit from when she went into heat and this cleaning product worked wonderfully on fresh and dried blood on the sofa and her (white!) blankets.
customer_reviews.author: DebraLilly

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well and leaves zero smell behind!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I was noticing that after cleaning a bathroom or kitchen my throat would start hurting. I'm not pregnant and was hesitant to use this to clean our master bathroom due to the usual strong chemicals left behind to linger. I went ahead and used it to clean everything and was pleasantly surprised to see it did not only do a great job at cleaning everything, even mildew stains, but it also left behind absolutely no smell. My husband also loved how it did such a great job at cleaning without the harsh smells we're used to from other products. Will continue to use for a LONG time.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Friend

customer_reviews.title: I Wondered Who Would BOTTLE CLEAN!
customer_reviews.text: UNSCENTED! My allergies are Soooo happy! Plus it works! Cleans, sparkles & shines! May not be totally chemical-free and a little pricey yet REALLY UNSCENTED gets it for me! Used mostly bathroom and it leaves EVERYTHING looking and SMELLING CLEAN!! Oh! And a sturdy spray top which SPRAYS, not dribble or spit!!
customer_reviews.author: Memum

customer_reviews.title: Like this cleaner very much
customer_reviews.text: Like this cleaner very much. The smell is great - no rinsing involved - works on multiple surfaces. I get dog drool on my tile floors and this is the only cleaner that gets it up with minimal effort. Can't say enough about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bella's mom

customer_reviews.title: Love this cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic cleaner. My wife cannot handle the smell of other cleaners and this works great. No smell and cleans as good if not better than the major cleaners. We have a cat so that's another reason I love this cleaner. Safe around pets
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: It’s an all purpose cleaner. Will not harm pets or humans.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying Better Life All Purpose Cleaner. I’m so happy it works. I tried it in the kitchen, bathrooms, ceramic floors, hardwoods, bath tub, shower, etc. It cleans. No smell. No residue.
customer_reviews.author: firefly

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I was hoping for. I wanted to replace bleach because I know it’s not good for my septic system. I sprayed it in/on my fiberglass tub and it did nothing. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: MARLENA MCELROY

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaning product out there
customer_reviews.text: Best cleaning product out there. I will never buy 409 or the like again! Notice that on the back of those cleaning products, there's instructions to wash the surface with soap and water--- AFTER cleaning! You can literally drink this stuff, although as it says right on the packaging, it doesn't taste very good and is better as a cleaner. I'm a believer!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Hermanson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order!!
customer_reviews.text: Product leaked and ruined other food items in amazon box
customer_reviews.author: Lee Lichtenstein

customer_reviews.title: This really is all-purpose and I love the way it cleans
customer_reviews.text: This really is all-purpose and I love the way it cleans. It's super economical and I use it on all surfaces in my house. From the bathroom to the kitchen to my furniture on the porch. I use it on glass, and mirrors and sinks. I highly recommend this cleaning product as effective and economical to use.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Great, almost completely odorless, cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I used this cleaner in both kitchen and bath and found that it worked well without the terrible smell that most cleaning products have. I first ordered this last May and just ran out last week! I bought another well known product from the store and just cleaned the bathroom with it - it reeks! Why, oh why did I let myself run out of the Better Life Product. The only reason that I didn't give this 5 stars is because I found that it left kitchen counters streaky and had to be rinsed. OK, 4 1/2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Clark

customer_reviews.title: Safe for babies
customer_reviews.text: I use this to disinfect all my packages delivery and mails/letters due to covid pandemic crisis. Very effective. Not too strong scent. I also have a baby in the house so it’s a plus that this antibacterial spray is safe for babies
customer_reviews.author: Grazy

customer_reviews.title: A great Cleaner product
customer_reviews.text: I like using the Better Life All - Purpose Cleaner. I bought the Unscented. And it has a nice clean smell to it . I diluted it with water in a spray bottle the size of a glass cleaner bottle and have 3/4 of the cleaner left to use diluted or full strength for other cleaning jobs . The cleaner works great on greasy stovetop and floors , tub , counters . I will continue to buy this product again . Well worth the money .
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Cass

customer_reviews.title: Best Cleaner I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best all purpose non-toxic cleaner I have ever used. The dirt just pulls away from anything you are trying to clean. Worth it. I buy the boxes now.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Never liked to clean the microwave with any kind of chemicals ...
customer_reviews.text: I figured I was throwing my money away buying a (healthier product) but it really does clean and breaks up grease on the stove. Never liked to clean the microwave with any kind of chemicals but this made it look like new. This is a healthier product and I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: L & C

customer_reviews.title: Not for hard water stains. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't work as advertised! It is NOT suitable for removing hard water stains on the counter tops. It's just a normal cleaner, doesn't work better than any other cleaner. Not a bang for my buck at all. I bought this specifically for hard water stains, and it doesn't work on them at all. Normal cleaner works better on hard water stains than this one!!
customer_reviews.author: kanika gupta

customer_reviews.title: 2👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Works surprisingly well. Put it to the test against those "super cleaner" tablets. This product beat them hands down. Had dust, dirt & grease buildup on top & back of fridge. Tried the the tablets 1st, took some off but not as the advertisement suggested. Sprayed this product, all came off easily. No scrubbing needed. Impressed
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Bowers

customer_reviews.title: This is no scam
customer_reviews.text: I was wondering why this was recommended when I was looking for mold killing cleaners. This stuff is good. Instant cleans, almost no chemical or obnoxious or any smell, perfectly safe. Squirts well, I’m pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ROYALTY

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff
customer_reviews.text: Just finished both of my 32oz unscented bottles ! This stuff is amazing 😉 Ordered another 2 pack this time trying out the clary sage / citrus. Awesome product that’s non toxic plus a great value price wise ! The first two bottles lasted us 5 1/2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Heavy On the Cleaning but Free of Scents or Perfumes
customer_reviews.text: Better Life What-ever! Unscented is truly scent free, a matter extremely important to those with chemical sensitivity and who have reactions to added scents and perfumes. It also works great at dissolving heavy duty dirty without a lot of effort on the part of the user. It's sold in bulk so you'll get your money's worth with the added bonus of it always being on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Jones

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this stuff. It is safe and works well. We have used it both indoors and out, and it tackles every job well. If you are looking to get away from the harsh chemicals, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony E Forney

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great product. It's pretty much common knowledge that you don't have to disinfect every time you clean. This product is perfect for times when general cleaning is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Haloguy

customer_reviews.title: Unscented Grease cutting power!
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned my stovetop with it last night. It cut through grease with ease and left a mirror shine plus no after scent! I think it's going to be a good product! I have plans to use it everywhere. I will try to update this when I have used it more.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Really approve this cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cleaner for several years now in all areas of my home. I have pets and grandkids and this product has cleaned well for me safely. I also have been using it to wipe up inside and around my bunny cages. I would recommend to replace harmful chemical spray cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: Kute

customer_reviews.title: Stop hesitating and just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! This stuff is amazing! I'm allergic to everything and this stuff just cleaned my bathroom sparkling clean with out me breaking a sweat with scrubbing or getting a rash. It works better than everything I've used before. I can't wait to see what else this wonderful all purpose cleaner can do.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I love this spary. It's the best ever for people with sensitivities to harsh chemicals. It leaves everything a nice shine & arrived in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Wallace-Osburn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect buy if you want to add your own essential oils!
customer_reviews.text: I love this unscented version so I can add my own essential oils for cleaning!! If you don't want to add your own their scented version is very nice as well. I like to add lemongrass EO to these so my counters smell fabulous :)
customer_reviews.author: Organica25

customer_reviews.title: Loving this product
customer_reviews.text: I love cleaning products and this is a fast new favorite. No scent which is great so it doesn’t fight my scented disinfecting wipes or if I try to light a candle. Doesn’t seem harsh but definitely gets the cleaning done!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Odor, Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The spray nozzle was broken on the first set I received. They immediately sent out a new set with a new nozzle, including the two bottles, for free!
customer_reviews.author: grumble

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love!
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY cleaner I use in the kitchen, and often in other places. No chemicals or odors, and does a great job cleaning up the dirt and grease. And it only takes a little to do even that. Love Better Life products, but especially this one. I just think they should have kept the name for the cleaner at "Whatever" because that's what it will clean, whatever you need!
customer_reviews.author: JetBay

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product came completely smashed & the bottle was loose so of course all the product leaked out, then it came in a very loose bag. 👎🏻 Lacking packing skills. Save ur money and get it somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: BNZ

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a product that really cleaned all items in my kitchen with ease. This is not the product. It doesn't work any better than your typical generic product from the store.
customer_reviews.author: Hammerhead

customer_reviews.title: This product works great. I used it mainly in my kitchen. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great all natural product. Safe around pets and kids. I will always keep this as my go to product. I just added a few drops of lemongrass to the bottle as I love the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: decent cleaner- soapy residue
customer_reviews.text: its not a bad cleaner. that said, it takes quite a bit more effort to clean up because even the tiniest bit is very soapy- like the equivalent of putting dawn on your counter and smearing it everywhere. and you have to rinse the cloth several times between each pass because it gets really sudsy as well. the cleaner doesn't say its concentrated or anything so idk what gives. you can't use a paper towel for this reason. will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: hussein m.

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner for sensitive noses!
customer_reviews.text: I really like how this product cleans! Also, it does not have strong odor, I'm super smell sensitive. I recommend this cleaner for kitchens and bath. Definite must have!
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite cleaning products
customer_reviews.text: This cleans everything. I use it on my kitchen surfaces, my bathroom surfaces and everywhere in between. It doesn't smell like harsh chemicals at all. I will be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Spiverson

customer_reviews.title: Great product /Shipping mishap
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Terrible shipping bottles were crushed can’t get them unbent ! Product still inside. Will have to see if can use spray trigger !
customer_reviews.author: J.D. Shopper

customer_reviews.title: ... it was on subscribe & save and I’m so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I only bought this because it was on subscribe & save and I’m so glad I did! This cleaner is non toxic and does the job well. I have very hard water and normally have to scrub my sinks and faucets several times, but this cleaner cut through the hard water deposits on one cleaning! It also cleaned my granite and left it super shiny! Love!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best All Purpose Cleaner Around!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! I am amazed at how well it cleans EVERY surface - AND it’s 100% plant based and non toxic!! Even leaves my gross sink basin gleaming - just spray and wipe!
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Method brand is better.....
customer_reviews.text: It’s an ok cleaner after trying this vs the method brand products I have switched to method. This was not very good on grease even after letting it soak for 10 minutes. Method worked both faster and better.
customer_reviews.author: Batfleck fan

customer_reviews.title: Clean and safe!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years. It cleans just as well, if not better, than any thing else I've tried, without the nasty chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Church

customer_reviews.title: Works better and smells safer than Windex
customer_reviews.text: It removes grease and cleans really well. I bought it because I didn’t want to inhale chemicals as I am pregnant. But I wish I knew about this sooner! It's a great product and a stable for me.
customer_reviews.author: John 3:16

customer_reviews.title: Please keep selling this line!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product line for years. It is simply the best. So many natural product lines out there promise so much, but this one delivers. It has super cleaning power, but it is gentle on the skin and lungs.
customer_reviews.author: Santippe

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I have been using it on everything including the bath tub which we bought the tub/tile cleaner from this brand for but does not work as good as the all purpose. Will buy the All Purpose cleaner again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Better Life is the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: No smell....cuts through that sticky kitchen grease....I didn't expect this to work so well! I will be getting it again! I think it will be my favorite cleaning product. Can't wait to try it on other areas! Awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Smells great and actually does work really well. Works better than most of the cleaners I’ve used and it smells better because it isn’t bogged down with bleach and other strong chemicals. I love that it is safe to use everywhere! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jaimee Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking to replace all my chemical cleaners And I’m very happy with this product. Cleans well without that harsh chemical odor of most cleaners. I will be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: DB8423

customer_reviews.title: Great clean, effective product for the price. Spray make me cough though.
customer_reviews.text: This is an effective product. Great price. I have not had any sensitivity issues with it so far. The formula is abrasive in spray form. It really makes me cough, so I have to pour it on a napkin to use it.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far! Safe around kids and pets. But always use as recommended. I clean everything with it. Always go for the most natural products around my home!
customer_reviews.author: Kipp Baker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent effective  natural cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Has no sent and we use it in the kitchen and bathroom. Cuts grease and soap scum and hard water spots. We use it on everything from the toilet to the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: mybluecastle

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well and works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! Use it on my stovetop, sinks and bathroom. No chemicals, gets things clean and shiny like new. Works in my opinion better than a majority of chemical laden products on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: The best! This stuff is worth a try.
customer_reviews.text: This product has replaced my windex and counter cleaners! I feel safe using this with my pets around knowing it won't harm them, and it's great knowing I'm not pouring harmful chemicals on my counters and tables. This product rivals all of those other products with harmful ingredients. This one is my favorite that I have tried from better life. I have also tried their kitchen cleaner and floor cleaner. It has a nice clean smell that isn't overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: M. Parnell

customer_reviews.title: Smells good cleans well
customer_reviews.text: Lots of product for the money and smells and works fine. I dont notice any chemical or strong perfumy smell. Some products have a strong chemical lemon oder. This one does not.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Better Life Natural All-Purpose Cleaner, Safe Around Kids & Pets, 32 Fl Oz (Pack of 2), 2409C
product_meta.description: Scent Name:Unscented| Size:32 Fl Oz (Pack of 2)The Green all-purpose cleaner for this, that, and especially those. From crayoned doors and spilled-on floors to stuck-on Funk and nasty gunk, what-EVER! Takes the work out of housework. Please note: one sprayer is included with two-packs. Please keep your sprayer and reuse it for the second bottle (simply remove the sprayer from the first bottle and apply to the second).
feature_bullets: 100% plant-derived cleaning agents from soap Bark, coconut, and corn

Effective on toilets, countertops, appliances, upholstery, baseboards, walls, floors, tables, showers, boats, cars, sporting equipment, toys - whatever!* any water-safe surface or upholstery marked "W" Or "W/S"
No alcohol, no petroleum solvents, no dyes, No parabens, No SLS/SLES
Cruelty Free and gentle on the planet
Please note: one sprayer is included with two-packs. Please keep your sprayer and reuse it for the second bottle (simply remove the sprayer from the first bottle and apply to the second).
